archimate:ArchimateModel.name: AH Digital Continuity v12
archimate:ArchimateModel.purpose:
--------------------------------------------------- --- Object of the document --------------------------------------------------- This model contains all the information gathered in the Digital Continuity initiative of Airbus Helicopters.
This document is a snapshot on an ongoing process. It contains many information about many IT systems in AH, in particular, details about the H175 configuration.
However, a lot of data are missing in this document, process description date but also IT description data.
The m part of the document contains the mappings.
This model tends to be stable and consistent.
--------------------------------------------------- --- Sources --------------------------------------------------- Many documents were delivered by Airbus: -BVA from DS -Architecture documents -Various interviews with M&T and IM people
--------------------------------------------------- --- Model conventions --------------------------------------------------- We distinguish two kinds of application layer items: -The software products (no prefix) -The instances of the software products part of the IT systems of a specific program (prefixed by the program name).
If the system is shared between programs, the prefix will include all the programs concerned.
--------------------------------------------------- --- View name conventions --------------------------------------------------- View beginning by: -a: Prerequisites -b: Business views -c: Hot points -d: EB -e: ET -f: ES -g: ED -h: h160 -i: h175 -j: Obsolescence -m: One Airbus Referential -p: Analysis -q: BVA -u: Software vendors offers -v: Business layer drafts -w: Working views -z: Model actions
--------------------------------------------------- --- Model artifact prefixes --------------------------------------------------- This model prefixes some entities with labels between parenthesis.
Functional prefixes: -(strat) prefixes the strategic intentions of AH in the digital transformation -(lae) prefixes entities created from the manufacturing document Laeticia. -(proc) procurement -(oar) One Airbus Referential -(ref) working view on referential -(c) defines the links between components for application views
Program prefixes: -(h160) prefixes the specific items related to the h160 program -(h175) the same for h175 -(h135) the same for h135 -(h145) the same for h145
Technical prefixes: -(excel) Excel spreadsheet -(access) Access DB -(flow) is a prefix attached to data and meaning that the data are exchanged between systems. Data that are not flagged by this prefix are supposed to be stored in database.
Classification: -(PP-I--) Pain points integration
Level of artifacts: -Level 0 noted (L0) -Level 1 noted (L1) -Level 2 noted (L2) -Level 3 noted (L3)
